definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea
history/annals/title of an official historian in ancient China

sentences.english: I'm a student in art history, a blogger, and occasionally a DJ.
sentences.chinese: 我是一个学生在美术史的DJ，一个博客，只是偶尔。

sentences.english: On the whole, the spatial relationship is the key of the western art history.
sentences.chinese: 纵观西方美术史，空间关系历来是画面关系的重点。

sentences.english: In the history of Chinese art, Huang Shen, a highly successful calligraphers and painters.
sentences.chinese: 在中国美术史上，黄慎是一位卓有成就的书画家。

sentences.english: Art critic and historian, School of the Art Institute of Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 美国芝加哥艺术学院美术史论与批评系主任。

sentences.english: In fine arts historical treatise teaching, question consciousness is the basic premise for researching studies.
sentences.chinese: 问题意识是美术史论教学中研究性学习的基本前提。

sentences.english: This course provides you with some basic conceptions of Western art history.
sentences.chinese: 这门课程提供大家一些西方美术史的基本概念。

sentences.english: The research on pictorial bronzes of Eastern Zhou is a major subject of study on art history and archeology.
sentences.chinese: 东周画像铜器是美术史和考古学研究的重要课题。

sentences.english: Require long-term study of the history of art of reading and reflection.
sentences.chinese: 美术史研究需要长期阅读和思考。

sentences.english: The War of Yan Ducal in the Eastern Zhou Dynasty and Its Role in the History;
sentences.chinese: 东周画像铜器是美术史和考古学研究的重要课题。

sentences.english: William is majoring in art history but considering a switch to geography.
sentences.chinese: 威廉目前主修美术史，不过正考虑改修地理。

sentences.english: Gombrich is the last master in the sense of traditional Western art history.
sentences.chinese: 贡布里希是西方传统美术史意义上最后一位大师。

sentences.english: It is a magnum opus painting that takes ox as the theme in Chinese art history.
sentences.chinese: 五牛图卷是中国美术史上以牛为题材的绘画代表作品。
